00025 #ifndef SYX_MEMORY_H
00026 #define SYX_MEMORY_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-config.h"
00029 
00030 #include "syx-platform.h"
00031 #include "syx-object.h"
00032 #include "syx-init.h"
00033 
00034 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00035 
00036 extern EXPORT SyxOop *_syx_freed_memory;
00037 extern EXPORT syx_int32 _syx_freed_memory_top;
00038 
00039 extern EXPORT SyxOop _syx_memory_gc_trans[0x100];
00040 extern EXPORT syx_int32 _syx_memory_gc_trans_top;
00041 extern EXPORT syx_int32 _syx_memory_gc_trans_running;
00042 
00043 EXPORT void syx_memory_init (syx_int32 size);
00044 EXPORT void syx_memory_clear (void);
00045 EXPORT SyxOop syx_memory_alloc (void);
00046 EXPORT void syx_memory_gc (void);
00047 
00048 EXPORT syx_bool syx_memory_save_image (syx_symbol path);
00049 EXPORT syx_bool syx_memory_load_image (syx_symbol path);
00050 
00052 INLINE void
00053 syx_memory_free (SyxOop oop)
00054 {
00055   memset (SYX_OBJECT(oop), '\0', sizeof (SyxObject));
00056   _syx_freed_memory[_syx_freed_memory_top++] = oop;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00061 INLINE syx_int32
00062 syx_memory_get_size (void)
00063 {
00064   return _syx_memory_size;
00065 }
00066 
00073 INLINE void
00074 syx_memory_gc_begin (void)
00075 {
00076   _syx_memory_gc_trans_running++;
00077 }
00078 
00080 EXPORT void syx_memory_gc_end (void);
00081 
00082 SYX_END_DECLS
00083 
00084 #endif /* SYX_MEMORY_H */
